QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Townlong Steppes!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
The Shado-Pan want to reclaim their land from the clutches of the yaungol, but lack the numbers to do so.
Assist them with their assault against the yaungol.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
